resources.name: get
resources.description: Get a Presence Definition. Apps should migrate to use GET /api/v2/presence/definitions/{definitionId} instead

resources.name: update
resources.description: Update a Presence Definition. Apps should migrate to use PUT /api/v2/presence/definitions/{definitionId} instead)

resources.name: delete
resources.description: Delete a Presence Definition. Apps should migrate to use DELETE /api/v2/presence/definitions/{definitionId} instead

resources.name: list
resources.description: Get an Organization's list of Presence Definitions. Apps should migrate to use GET /api/v2/presence/definitions instead

resources.name: create
resources.description: Create a Presence Definition. Apps should migrate to use POST /api/v2/presence/definitions instead
